pageProduct.name: Sukin Deep Cleanse Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Nourishes With Avocado Oil, Wheat Protein & Sustainably Sourced Algae For Shinier Hair.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Lightweight Deep Cleanse Conditioner Is Enriched With A Blend Of Wheat Protein, Avocado Oil & Sustainably Sourced Algae To Leave Your Hair Shiny, Smooth And Soft. With Native Australian Lemon Myrtle & Conditioning Vitamin E To Protect Hair From Environmental Damage. Infused With The Scent Of Freesia And Lily.

Ingredients

Ngredients:Water (Aqua), Aloebarbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Persea Gratissima (Avocado)Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut)Oil, Algae Extract, Vinegar Extract(Apple Cider), Mentha Australis Leaf Extract (River Mint), Santalum Acuminatum Fruit Extract (Quandong), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Oil (Lemon Myrtle), Glycine Soja (Soybean)Oil, Sorbitol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Glycerin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Hexyl Cinnamal**, Limonene**, Linalool***Natural Fragrance**Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Following Sukin Deep Cleanse Shampoo, Massage Into The Hair, Focusing On The Ends. Rinse Thoroughly.
